author: Noppasate (Deppe) Hirunwathit
description: Noppasate Hirunwathit says of his drink, “Nostalgia is inspired by the tastes of my childhood and the memories that remain today. The bitter taste of medicine when we were sick, the taste of lollipops or our favourite fruits; these each evoke childhood memories and feelings from when they were first experienced.“For me, my strongest memories are the delicious tastes from food and drink that would eventually pave the career I have today. Nostalgia awakens beautiful memories and inspires my creative and positive actions today. Nostalgia reminds me of the joyful moments of my childhood.”
name: Nostalgia

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
